channel.title: Tutorial Section - June
channel.description:
[code]#####Section 1: The Best Tutorials of the Month:
Tutorials are arguably the best way to learn how to do things. They're a step-by-step guide on how to add features, modify existing features or even in some cases remove features. Here is a list (in no particular order) of tutorials that deserve particular recognition this month. Congratulations to all listed!
Tutorials featured in this section do not necessarily have to have been posted this month, they're just tutorials that we feel deserve recognition. If your tutorial isn't featured this month, take a look at these tutorials, improve yours accordingly and you could be featured in the next issue!
######Data Encapsulation and its Importance in RSPS Programming: * Language: Java (Applicable to most OOP languages, though) * Creator(s): [Clawz fury](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=490965) * What the tutorial is: An explanation of what data encapsulation is, why it should be used, when it should be used and how to use it. * Link: [click me](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,625919.0.html)
######Edit and Get Your NPC Data Server Sided: * Language: Java * Creator(s): [Arham 4](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=468771) * What the tutorial is: An explanation of how to created an improved framework for NPC definitions. * Base: Palidino's 562 * Link: [click me](http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,639657.0.html)
######Creating Your Own Highscores from Scratch: * Languages: PHP, HTML, SQL, Java * Creator(s): [Fox2007](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=73533) * What the tutorial is: An explanation of how to create your own highscores page and link it to your server. * Base: 718 server, although modifications can be made to use on any server. * Link: [click me](//www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,635974.0.html)[/code]

item.title: Tutorial Section - June
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I welcome any feedback on this, it’s my first section for the MM so I’m not sure on how good you think it is.

item.title: Tutorial Section - June
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[code]#####Section 1: The Best Tutorials of the Month:

Tutorials are arguably the best way to learn how to do things. They’re a step-by-step guide on how to add features, modify existing features or even in some cases remove features. Here is a list (in no particular order) of tutorials that deserve particular recognition this month. Congratulations to all listed!

Tutorials featured in this section do not necessarily have to have been posted this month, they’re just tutorials that we feel deserve recognition. If your tutorial isn’t featured this month, take a look at these tutorials, improve yours accordingly and you could be featured in the next issue!

######Data Encapsulation and its Importance in RSPS Programming:

  • Language: Java (Applicable to most OOP languages, though)
  • Creator(s): Clawz fury
  • What the tutorial is: An explanation of what data encapsulation is, why it should be used, when it should be used and how to use it.
  • Link: click me

######Edit and Get Your NPC Data Server Sided:

  • Language: Java
  • Creator(s): Arham 4
  • What the tutorial is: An explanation of how to created an improved framework for NPC definitions.
  • Base: Palidino’s 562
  • Link: click me

######Creating Your Own Highscores from Scratch:

  • Languages: PHP, HTML, SQL, Java
  • Creator(s): Fox2007
  • What the tutorial is: An explanation of how to create your own highscores page and link it to your server.
  • Base: 718 server, although modifications can be made to use on any server.
  • Link: click me[/code]

Read full topic
